pages.text: Starting out, you will only have access to a few effects and forms. Once you have access to the Glyph Press, you will be able to craft any spell. To help you in your decision, here are a few spells to start with.

pages.title: Break
pages.text: A starter effect, combine this with Projectile -> Break or Touch -> Break to harvest iron and lower materials.

pages.title: Harm
pages.text: A starter effect, combine this with Projectile -> Harm or Touch -> Harm to damage enemies a small amount.

pages.title: Haste
pages.text: A tier 1 effect that can be crafted using the Glyph Press. Grants the target a speed boost. Try Self -> Haste

pages.title: Light
pages.text: A tier 1 effect that can be crafted using the Glyph Press. Creates a permanent light source when used on a block. Cast on entities to grant night vision.

pages.title: Amplify
pages.text: A tier 1 augment that can be crafted using the Glyph Press. Increases the power of most spells. Try Projectile -> Break -> Amplify -> Amplify for breaking obsidian, or apply to Harm for better damage.

pages.title: Ignite
pages.text: A tier 1 effect that can be crafted using the Glyph Press. Ignites entities and blocks. A cheap way to increase damage. Try Projectile -> Harm -> Ignite

pages.title: Summon Steed
pages.text: A tier 1 effect that can be crafted using the Glyph Press. Summons a temporary, tamed, and saddled horse.
To learn about creating new glyphs, see the section on the Glyph Press.
